game.name: Flowers And Favours: Florist Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Flowers And Favours는 편안하고 아늑한 플로리스트 시뮬레이션 게임입니다. 나만의 꽃가게를 운영하고, 다양한 아름다운 꽃들을 실험하며, 사랑스러운 의인화된 고객들을 위한 특별한 꽃다발을 만들어 보세요. 당신의 플로리스트 여정이 지금 시작됩니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Flowers And Favours is a relaxing cozy florist sim. Run your own flower shop, experiment with a stunning variety of florals, and craft unique bouquets for your adorable customers. Your floral journey begins today!

reviewHighlights.text: Super fun little game. There's not a lot to it. You make bouquets for customers and unlock new flowers, wraps and accessories. But it's very cozy and...
Got this game for my girlfriend, She loves it and its the perfect cozy game to get your mind off anything bothering ya!
